body_html:
@damienmg Bazel making backwards incompatible changes faster than we can release fixes is not ideal.

@av8ramit we could do 1.3.2 the same way we did 1.3.1. But 1.4 is close enough so maybe not. In any case, we should definitely test for exact Bazel version (down to patch) in configure. It seems necessary.

body:
@damienmg Bazel making backwards incompatible changes faster than we can release fixes is not ideal. 

@av8ramit we could do 1.3.2 the same way we did 1.3.1. But 1.4 is close enough so maybe not. In any case, we should definitely test for exact Bazel version (down to patch) in configure. It seems necessary.
